title: Cryo
description:
The smashing debutalbum from Swedish EBM-sensation Cryo. Cold, danceable and static music that has made he magazines go crazy: Sonic Seducer (9/10), Gothtronic (8/10), Release magazine (8/10), Elektrauma (Album Of The Month) etc. etc. The list is long. Entered the official Swedish album charts on position 90.
If you buy the complete album you will also get the limited disc (PROCD009L) only made in 200 copies worldwide included for free. On this disc you will find remixes from Iambia and Necro Facility among other nice things.

01 - Waiting For The Machine (2:02)
02 - Does It Hurt (4:50)
03 - The Pain (4:38) 	
04 - In The Shadows (4:30) 	
05 - One (3:46) 	
06 - Want It (4:36)

14 - Uniform (Dance Mix) (6:41)
